message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth significantly more than what you're looking for, but we believe it could greatly benefit your business. We're offering it to you today for $12,000. Let's make this deal happen!

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
